item.title: EP 304 - The Seductress Special!
item.itunes:title: The Seductress Special!
item.description:
Today we travel to Russia to investigate a horrible crime, and then we go back to Bulgari to be seduced by the Samodiva!

Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

ENVIOUS RAGE Woman butchers her naked model sister, 17, before gouging out her eyes and hacking off her ears in a jealous frenzy

https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/10000701/woman-butchers-model-sister-hacked-ears-gouged-eyes/

 

Elizaveta Dubrovina

https://real-life-villains.fandom.com/wiki/Elizaveta_Dubrovina

 

High woman in jealous rage allegedly butchers, mutilates model sister

https://torontosun.com/news/crime/drugged-woman-in-jealous-rage-allegedly-butchers-mutilates-model-sister/wcm/df3b043d-4160-4acf-8b16-804bf3f9c9a6

 

Model mutilates younger teen sister’s face, gouges her eyes out in jealous rage over her beauty, police say

https://www.crimeonline.com/2019/09/26/model-mutilates-younger-teen-sisters-face-gouges-her-eyes-out-in-jealous-rage-over-her-beauty-police-say/

 

Video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YhKqDDwFcjQ

 

The Golden Apple animated series - pilot episode

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-golden-apple-animated-series-pilot-episode#/updates/all

 

Samodiva: The Life-Sucking Temptress and Wood Nymph of Bulgarian Folklore

https://www.ancient-origins.net/myths-legends-europe/samodiva-bulgarian-folklore-0011124

 

Samodiva (folklore)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samodiva_(folklore)

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
